snippet: President Obama’s specific goals for his second term are not known, but many in the scientific community hope he will continue to push for robust financing of basic research, especially in energy.
abstract: Many scientists hope Pres Obama will continue to push for robust financing of basic scientific research, especially in energy, though Obama's specific goals for his second term are not known.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s specific goals for his second term are not known, but many in the scientific community hope he will continue to push for robust financing of basic research, especially in energy.

headline.seo: Obama’s Re-election Welcomed by Many Science Researchers
headline.main: Scientists Hope Obama Continues Support for Basic Research
headline.print_headline: Scientists Hope Obama Continues Support for Basic Research
